Detailed Description

This file declares useful functions and types for the VISHNU list session command.

Author:
Ibrahima Cisse (ibrahima.cisse@sysfera.com)

Function Documentation

boost::shared_ptr<Options> makeListSessionOptions ( std::string  pgName,
StringcallBackType &  fUserId,
std::string &  dietConfig,
StringcallBackType &  fMachineId,
StringcallBackType &  fSessionId,
StatuscallBackType &  fStatus,
ClosePolicycallBackType &  fClosePolicy,
IntcallBackType &  fSessionInactivityDelay,
LongcallBackType &  fStartDateOption,
LongcallBackType &  fEndDateOption 
)

To build options for the VISHNU list session command.

Parameters:
pgName : The name of the command
fUserId,: The user identifier option callback
dietConfig,: Represents the VISHNU config file
fMachineId,: The machine identifier option callback
fSessionId,: The session identifier option callback
fStatus,: The session status option callback
fClosePolicy,: The session close policy option callback
fSessionInactivityDelay,: The session inactivity delay option callback
fStartDateOption,: The session start date option callback
fEndDateOption,: The session end date option callback
Returns:
The description of all options allowed by the command
